the Legacy?

mission.heading:
We are building the

Digital Rihal.
mission.desc: For centuries, the student of knowledge relied on the <italics>Rihal</italics> (bookstand) to support their study. In the digital age, we found our tools lacking. We are here to fix that.

problem.title: The "PDF Graveyard"
problem.desc1: The internet is full of Islamic content, but it is <strong_text>fragmented</strong_text>. A blurry PDF here, a YouTube playlist there, an audio file on a lost server.
problem.desc2: The serious student (*Talib al-Ilm*) spends more time <italics_finding>finding</italics_finding> and <italics_organizing>organizing</italics_organizing> resources than actually <strong_memorizing>memorizing</strong_memorizing> them.

values.title: Built on Three Pillars
values.subtitle: Our core philosophy drives every line of code.

preservation.title: Preservation (Hifdh)
preservation.desc: We don't just display text; we treat it as data. Every verse is indexed, searchable, and linked, preserving the structure of the Matn.

intelligence.title: Intelligence (Fahm)
intelligence.desc: We use AI not to replace the scholar, but to serve the student. Real-time recitation correction and semantic search bridge the language barrier.

community.title: Community (Ummah)
community.desc: Knowledge is not meant to be solitary. We connect students into cohorts to revive the spirit of the Halaqah digitally.

methodology.label: Verified Knowledge
methodology.heading:
Built on the
Shoulders of Giants.
methodology.desc: In an era of misinformation, the source matters. We don't just scrape the web. Every text on Iqraa is sourced from verified <strong_text>Tahqiq</strong_text> (critical editions), reviewed against manuscripts, and structured according to the methodology of the scholars.

cta.heading: Ready to begin?
cta.subtext: The path to knowledge begins with a single word: Iqraa.

hero.heading:
Structured Paths to
Scientific Mastery.
hero.desc: Knowledge is not gathered randomly. It is built brick by brick. We have curated <strong_text>7 specialized tracks</strong_text> based on the traditional <italics>Manhaj</italics> to take you from beginner to mastery.

progression.title: Clear Progression
progression.desc: Stop guessing what to read next. Each track has a defined sequence: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced.

verified.title: Verified Texts
verified.desc: Every book in the roadmap is selected for its academic weight and verified for authenticity.

growth.title: Track Your Growth
growth.desc: Visualize your journey. Mark books as complete, track memorization, and earn mastery status.

catalog.title: Available Curriculums
catalog.subtitle: Select a science to begin your journey.

cta.title: Not sure where to start?
